name: Arcus I-II-III
summary: Arcus I-II-III (アークス I・II・III) is a first-person dungeon RPG released exclusively for the Sega Mega-CD Japan. It combines the first three games in Wolf Team's Arcus series; Arcus, Arcus II: Silent Symphony and Arcus III, originally released for Japanese computers between 1988 and 1991.
